suggest.meta_keywords: Azion, Tor exit nodes, IP blocking, edge firewall configuration, network security, Azion Rules Engine, network lists, API configuration, Edge Firewall, Azion Console
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to configure Azion's Edge Firewall using the Rules Engine to block requests from IPs on the Azion IP Tor Exit Nodes list.

current.meta_description: Configure a behavior using Rules Engine to block all requests coming from IPs contained in the Azion IP Tor Exit Nodes network list.
